author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-1923: add toString to core IndexReaders

author: davidb
msg: Added support for old way of configuring endpoint location back in. The following properties on the exposed services are now equivalents and can be set to a value such as http://localhost:9876/myService

The endpoint.uri is a new property that's introduced in the OSGi Remote Service Admin spec. This is now the standard way to configure the endpoint URI. The old properties are still supported for backward compatibility.
